title: Google Assistant is coming to the Galaxy Watch 4 ‘this summer’
content:
With its one-year anniversary approaching, the Galaxy Watch 4 is finally getting an actual timeline for one of its most anticipated features. Google Assistant is officially getting a release date on the Galaxy Watch 4 this summer.

more…

The post Google Assistant is coming to the Galaxy Watch 4 ‘this summer’ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Nearly a year after its debut, the Galaxy Watch 4 is finally getting a loose release date for Google Assistant to debut.
